name: Joon-Kyung Seong
content: BREIN LAB – Brain Reverse Engineering by Intelligent Neuroimaging Brain Reverse Engineering by Intelligent Neuroimaging (BREIN) Group at Korea University The Brain Reverse Engineering by Intelligent Neuroimaging (BREIN) group at Korea University aims at the research in quantitative neuroimaging and neuroimage-based analysis by employing computational technologies. ConnectivityBrain network analysis based on DTI Shape Analysisshape-based cortical & sub-cortical analysis Brain DiseasesDiagnosis using brain image & deep learningNEW PUBLICATIONS Gait impairment associated with neuroimaging biomarkers in Alzheimer’s diseaseSung-Woo Kim, Dong Ho Kim, Jin Yong Hong, Kyung-Ryoul Mun, Dawoon Jung, Ickpyo Hong, Ríona Mc Ardle, Joon-Kyung Seong, & Min Seok BaekPublished February 2025 at Scientific Reports Interactive-Time Text-Guided Editing of 3D FaceYeon-Jeong Lee, Yeong-Hun Song, Sang Wook Yoo, & Joon-Kyung SeongPublished December 2024 at International Conference on Pattern Recognition Heterogeneity of factors associated with cognitive decline and cortical atrophy in early-versus late-onset Alzheimer’s diseaseJaelim Cho, Cindy W Yoon, Jeong-Hyeon Shin, Haeun Seo, Woo-Ram Kim, Han Kyu Na, Justin Byun, Samuel N Lockhart, Changsoo Kim, Joon-Kyung Seong, & Young NohPublished September 2024 at Scientific Reports Disentangling brain atrophy heterogeneity in Alzheimer's disease: A deep self-supervised approach with interpretable latent spaceSohyun Kang, Sung-Woo Kim & Joon-Kyung SeongPublished August 2024 at NeuroImage Data-driven simulation of network-based tau spreading tailored to individual Alzheimer's patientsSung-Woo Kim, Hanna Cho, Yeonjeong Lee, Chul Hyoung Lyoo & Joon-Kyung SeongPublished May 2024 at Engineering with Computers Cancer cell-specific and pro-apoptotic SMAC peptide-doxorubicin conjugated prodrug encapsulated aposomes for synergistic cancer immunotherapyJinseong Kim, Man Kyu Shim, Yujeong Moon, Jeongrae Kim, Hanhee Cho, Wan Su Yun, Nayeon Shim, Joon-Kyung Seong, Yonghyun Lee, Dong-Kwon Lim & Kwangmeyung KimPublished Mar 2024 in Journal of NanobiotechnologyWe are waiting for new passionate student!
